text: Adam Green (born March 31, 1975) is an American actor-filmmaker known for  horror and comedy films, including the Hatchet franchise, Frozen, and the television series Holliston.Originating from Holliston, Massachusetts, Green earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Television and Film production at Hofstra University and founded ArieScope Pictures with fellow filmmaker Will Barratt in 1998.  Green is also the lead singer for the hard rock and metal band "Haddonfield."
